ActOfficial Languages Act
PrecisAmendment to Order in Council P.C. 2006-711 of July 13, 2006 concerning the appointment of DYANE ADAM to hold the office of Commissioner of Official Languages for Canada while that office is vacant until the day on which a Commissioner of Official Languages for Canada is appointed.
